short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The fastest bug reporting tool. Cut your bug reporting time by 50X.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slyce makes capturing, sharing, diagnosing, and resolving software bugs efficiently. The platform emphasizes speed and integration, enabling users to work seamlessly across various tools like Jira, Slack, and GitHub. Slyce aims to enhance productivity by providing a centralized solution for all bug management needs, making it easier for development teams to maintain software quality.
